---
title: "Group 24 UCSB domestic grad enrollment"
author: "Van Gonzales & Meghna Rao"
date: "11/16/2021"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

```{r}
# Read in data
ucsb_grad <- read.csv(here("data", "ucsb_grad_data.csv"))
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = ucsb_grad, aes(x = year_abbr, y = domestic_enrollment,
                             fill = ethnicity)) +
  geom_col(position = "fill") +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Proportion of Domestic Graduate Enrollment", 
       title = "Figure 1: Proportion of Domestic Graduate Enrollment at UCSB by Ethnicity (2008 - 2019)",
       fill = "Ethnicity")
```
